sql.if: and userid in ( select userid from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
and ( title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or userid in ( select userid from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) )

mapper.insert: insert into board1(userid, writer, title, content, filename, filepath, code) values (#{userid}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code})
mapper.update: update board1 set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
update board1 set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board1 where code=#{code}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comments(content, userid, pid) values (#{content}, #{userid}, #{pid})
mapper.select: select c.*, (select writer from member2 where userid = c.userid) writer, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') writedate from board_comments c where pid=#{pid} order by id desc
mapper.update: update board_comments set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
